name: Haven
headline: AI workforce for property management
description: Haven is building AI Agents to automate property management operations. Our first Agent is automating the maintenance coordination process. This means answering the phone when tenants have a maintenance issue, diagnosing the issue, dispatching a technician, and then following up with tenants to make sure the issue is resolved.

founders.name: Juan Burgos, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO @ Haven, an AI-powered powered front desk for property managers. Prior to Haven, my cofounders and I built PeerPal (acquired), an admissions engagement platform for private K-12 schools.

founders.name: Satya Koppu, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder at Haven. Former co-founder of PeerPal (acquired).

# Less Overhead, Happier Tenants and Owners
Haven's AI agents, trained for property management, handle manual tasks like maintenance intake and coordination, so your team can focus on delivering excellent service to tenants and owners.
[Book Demo](https://www.usehaven.ai/<https:/calendly.com/havenapp/haven-demo>)
Backed by the same investors as
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6671d2a074b803c8c09df551/6671de09bf6aadc3d0f00987_logos_openai.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6671d2a074b803c8c09df551/6671de09de2dce17b69ba4da_logos_airbnb.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6671d2a074b803c8c09df551/6671de0943155ba6dd937f8a_logos_stripe.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6671d2a074b803c8c09df551/6671de0968273d4446575bac_dropbox.svg)
## Al Agents that answer your tenant calls like a human
AI Agents that are available 24/7 to answer calls from prospects or tenants, manage maintenance requests, respond to questions, and even schedule appointments.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6671d2a074b803c8c09df551/66753832ab4ca69767d593d5_Audio_wave__1_.svg)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6671d2a074b803c8c09df551/6671e44cc8377bba39a969cf_answer-tab1-image.webp)

Always answers and never misses a lead

Answers any question a property

## A better tenant experience, with less work for your staff
90%
of tenant calls automated
<10s
response times
15+
hours saved per week
## Communicate with tenants and prospects across any channel
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6671d2a074b803c8c09df551/6672f7abd9a7130730dc429a_phone-text.svg)
Integrates with your existing VoIP/phone tree to answer calls like a human agent.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6671d2a074b803c8c09df551/6672f3951235b132922218c2_Slide%2015.png)
AI Agents can communicate via SMS or a chat widget embedded on your website.
Connects to your Software
Our AI integrates with your existing PMS and/or CRM to perform actions like creating work orders and logging voice recordings.
Trained for Property Management
Our Al was developed and specialized for the property management industry, with a deep understanding of how to interact with tenants, prospects, and owners.
Available 24/7
Provide tenants with emergency & after hours support from a reliable assistant that never misses a call.
How it works
## Deploy Your Entire Portfolio in 30 minutes
[Connect to your data](https://www.usehaven.ai/<#w-tabs-2-data-w-pane-0>)[Sync with existing workflows](https://www.usehaven.ai/<#w-tabs-2-data-w-pane-1>)[Watch your AI perform](https://www.usehaven.ai/<#w-tabs-2-data-w-pane-2>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6671d2a074b803c8c09df551/6672e8ae601bd80c72985019_6542c83cea80a012773222ec_Slide%2010%201.webp)
We'll onboard your AI Agent onto the platforms your team uses everyday. These are the systems it will pull from, and report to, whenever it handles an inquiry from a prospect or tenant.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6671d2a074b803c8c09df551/6675eac4f0f96367ee374372_Slide%205.png)
Generative AI should work with your existing systems, just like any member of your staff. During onboarding, Haven works closely with your operations and property managers to tailor our solution to your existing workflows. If that means customizations to fit your process, then our team will handle them at no extra charge.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6671d2a074b803c8c09df551/6675eac43038107262f400b2_Slide%206.png)
Monitor your AI’s activity across your properties and track performance all from a single dashboard — or wherever else you run reporting.
## Better Resident Experiences — and a healthier bottom line
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6671d2a074b803c8c09df551/667550ad17490e9db075ddfe_exp-1.png)
Maintenance, leasing and tenant support — your entire Al workforce on one platform.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6671d2a074b803c8c09df551/667550ac312dc871801b23d7_exp-2.png)
70%+ less expensive than a call center or after-hours answering service.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6671d2a074b803c8c09df551/667550ad85b165c07c97f145_rxp-3.png)
Al that sounds and performs like your best staff
#### Focus on growing your portfolio, and let our AI handle the rest.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Haven**

Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's W23 batch, Haven is tackling a significant pain point in property management: the inefficiency of handling maintenance requests and tenant communications. With a lean team of just three, Haven is setting the stage for a revolution in how property management operations are managed through the power of artificial intelligence.

**Mission and Offerings:**
Haven's mission is clear: to create an AI workforce that automates property management tasks, ultimately driving efficiency and enhancing tenant experiences. Their flagship product is an AI Agent that automates the maintenance coordination process. This means that when a tenant experiences an issue, the AI handles everything from the initial call to diagnosing the problem, dispatching technicians, and following up to ensure the issue is resolved.

Their features are impressive:
- **24/7 Availability**: The AI agents can answer calls any time, effectively acting like a human assistant. 
- **Automation**: About 90% of tenant calls can be automated, which means quicker responses (often under 10 seconds) and significant time savings—an estimated 15+ hours per week for property management staff.
- **Seamless Integration**: Haven’s AI can sync with existing Property Management Systems (PMS) and Customer Relationship Management (CRM) tools, which helps in creating work orders and logging voice responses directly.

Haven caters to various use cases including maintenance intake and coordination, leasing support, and emergency response assistance, making it a versatile tool for property managers.

**Market Positioning:**
Tagged as a SaaS, real estate, B2B, proptech, and AI solution, Haven’s focus on property management positions it uniquely in a niche that has generally lagged in tech adoption. Their approach not only improves operational efficiency but also creates a better experience for both tenants and property owners.

**Backed by Notable Investors:**
Haven is also backed by well-known investors like OpenAI, Airbnb, Stripe, and Dropbox, which adds a level of credibility and support as they grow.

**Conclusion:**
Haven is leaning into AI to transform property management, promising reduced overhead while enhancing tenant satisfaction. So, if you're managing properties and feeling bogged down by maintenance requests, it might be time to let Haven's AI workforce take over those mundane tasks, leaving your team free to focus on what really matters. 

For more information, check out their website: [usehaven.ai](https://www.usehaven.ai/) and perhaps schedule a demo to see how it can benefit your operations.
